casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Andrette MCNEILL 446A13-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2016 Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, William West, District Attorney, Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of September 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of September 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of September 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
